EmailTemplate.name: Digital First.4-09-21 DBNK DF Email 7.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Register Now - Omnichannel Confidential: Defining Digital-First
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
What is the most critical thing to do right now to accelerate your digital-first strategy?
Find out in our free webinar with The Financial Brand as NCR’s Doug Brown and Wintrust’s Tom Ormseth share key insights.
Omnichannel Confidential: Defining Digital-First in Today’s World Wednesday, April 14 at 2 p.m. ET
In this webinar, you’ll explore:
-
What digital-first banking really means and why it matters
-
Proprietary research highlighting the tools consumers want
-
The most critical thing to do right now to accelerate your strategy
-
How Wintrust is taking an omnichannel approach to outrunning its biggest competition ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
